summary: Adds an awesome spell into the game.
descriptionHtml:
Description
_____________
Spell shoots out continuous rings of ice which freezes people or kills them. Rakoot was just a random name i gave it.Look in inventory for the spell tome.

Installation
__________________________________________
Nexus Mod Mananger
1) Click download with NMM.

Manual Installation
1) Download the file.
2) Extract the file
3) Copy/Move the file to your Skyrim/Data directory

Visit this website for game reviews
_________________________________
http://blackrapgames.host-ed.me/
author: XGhostSlayer
